short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage salesforce login credentials; Search salesforce metadata(apex, visualforce, etc.); Perform salesforce deployment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Latest Updates (v1.0.31, 2021-4-16)
* Add default RedirectURI After login

Easymeta is a lightweight salesforce tool to help salesforce Admin/Developer/Business user to manage salesforce metadata by clicks both in salesforce classic and lightning experience!

With Easymeta, you can:
#1 Manage your multiple salesforce accounts in one place via OAUTH
#2 Search salesforce metadata anytime, anywhere on salesforce page.
#3 Set an unique favicon for each org
#4 Deploy apex code, custom fields, flows, etc. by few clicks
